import react from "react" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import "./menu-item.styles.scss" const MenuItems = ({title , imageUrl, size , history, match, linkUrl}) => (
history.push(`${match.url}${linkUrl}`)}>

{title.toUpperCase()}

Shop Now
) export default withRouter(MenuItems)
